Article.Title: Live From The TechCrunch Disrupt SF Hackathon Finals
Article.Content: Facebook LinkedIn Backstage With the Hackathon Winners:Â Livebolt A mere 24 hours ago an eclectic group of coders gathered outside of The Concourse at San Francisco Design Center intent on hacking together the next great app. And now after a sleepless night these groups are ready to show off their creation on massive the TechCrunch Disrupt stage. Join us live as these apps, services and hardware hacks are displayed for the first time. Each group gets 60 short seconds to show off their work and win over the judges. Best of luck to everyone! The presentations will start promptly at 11:00 PDT.
